channel.title: How do I make directory to places
channel.description:
I look at guides and they have it where you click and you will be where you want to be
Like it will be
Cats
You can click cats and it will bring you down to the section about cats!
I want to be able to do that.
Someone help please, I didnt kno where to put so shut the fuck up and help me not flame for stupid reason.
Thanks!

item.title: How do I make directory to places
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=478895.msg3508363#msg3508363 date=1298345472]
And by the way vain, the ones you gave him link to the ones at your post, not his
[/quote]because we used the came anchors.

Anchors go by the whole topic, not the post. (Well only the topic page, mulitple pages will most likely need complete urls, and not iurls.[/quote]

Anchors… coming since the Dark Ages.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make directory to places
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zachs Owner Zachs
item.description:
@Owner_Zachs wrote:

Okay. Go to any staff guide.

They have a Index

How to start server (In blue where you can click)
Where to start your server (In blue where u can click)

And when you click it, it drags down to the section so lets say I clicked “How to start a server”

HOW TO START A SERVER (It would take me here when i clicked those key words.

blah blah blah
I want to find out how that works. How I can make it so people can click it and it will drag them down to here.

Read full topic
